meanings.definition: Material used to cover or enclose something.
meanings.sent1: The colorful wrappings made the gift look special.
meanings.sent2: She carefully removed the wrappings to reveal the present inside.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous cat played with the wrappings, creating a mess.
meanings.sent4: His kindness was like the warm wrappings of a comforting hug.
meanings.sent5: The shiny wrappings sparkled under the bright lights.

meanings.definition: The act of covering or enclosing something.
meanings.sent1: His quick wrappings of the bandage stopped the bleeding.
meanings.sent2: The wrappings of the blanket kept her warm on the cold night.
meanings.sent3: The magician's fast wrappings of the cloth amazed the audience.
meanings.sent4: The silence in the room was like a heavy wrappings around their conversation.
meanings.sent5: The careful wrappings of the fragile item protected it during shipping.

meanings.definition: The outer covering of a package or gift.
meanings.sent1: The shiny wrappings on the present caught her eye.
meanings.sent2: He tore off the wrappings eagerly to see what was inside.
meanings.sent3: The crumpled wrappings on the floor revealed the excitement of the party.
meanings.sent4: The bright wrappings of the box hinted at the surprise within.
meanings.sent5: The delicate wrappings added an extra touch of beauty to the gift.
